scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a publicly accessible customer churn prediction model deployed by a consumer banking institution.  The attacker leverages carefully crafted input queries to infer details about individual customers, violating privacy regulations.
initial_goal: Reconstruct sensitive customer data (age, income, credit score) for a specific subset of customers from the deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A large bank has deployed a machine learning model to predict customer churn. The model is accessible through a public API with rate limits to prevent abuse.
